    • reload

      object - Value to set.
      Gibt zurück:

    • getOrSet

      <T> T getOrSet(String path, String target, T value)
      Gets a value if it exists. Returns assigned default value and sets it in the config otherwise.
      Parameter:
      path - The path to the section.
      target - The target key.
      value - Default value.
      Gibt zurück:
      The existing or default value.

    • getOrSet

      <T> T getOrSet(String target, T value)
      Gets a value if it exists. Returns assigned default value and sets it in the config otherwise.
      Parameter:
      target - The target key.
      value - Default value.
      Gibt zurück:
      The existing or default value.

      Parameter:

      target - Target key.
      Gibt zurück:
      The value.

    • getKeys

      Collection<String> getKeys(boolean deep)
      Gets all keys. 
           
     Collection<String> keys = getKeys(false);
     // Example: ["monster1", "monster2", "settings"]

     Collection<String> keys = getKeys(true);
     // Example: ["monster1", "monster1.hp", "monster1.items", "monster1.items.mainhand", "monster2"...]
      Parameter:
      deep - Whether to get keys deeply.
      Gibt zurück:
      Collection of keys.

    • getKeys

      Collection<String> getKeys(String section, boolean deep)
      Gets all keys from a section. 
           
     Collection<String> keys = getKeys("monster1", false);
     // Example: ["hp", "items"]

     Collection<String> keys = getKeys("monster1", true);
     // Example: ["hp", "items", "items.mainhand"]
      Parameter:
      section - The section to get keys from.
      deep - Whether to get keys deeply.
      Gibt zurück:
      Collection of keys.
